projects.name: Project Phoenix
projects.description: Critical client delivery project for Acme Corp, our largest revenue generator, currently facing legal escalation due to 3-week delay.
projects.notes: Our largest client (Acme Corp) is furious about the 3-week delay in delivery. They've sent legal notice threatening contract cancellation if we don't ship by Friday, February 16th. Engineering team working 24/7 to resolve blocker. Consider escalating to executive team for resource allocation.
keyRisks: Legal liability for breach of contract
Reputation damage in the enterprise market
dependencies: Infrastructure team must complete security audit
Legal review of modified SLA terms

projects.name: Project Maintenance
projects.description: Scheduled server maintenance and software updates for Q1 2026, routine operational work with planned downtime.
projects.notes: Scheduled server maintenance and software updates for Q1 2026. Operations team has approval for next month. No immediate action required. Planned maintenance window available.

projects.name: Project Innovation Hub
projects.description: R&D initiative exploring AI integration for customer support automation with early prototype showing 40% reduction in ticket resolution time.
projects.notes: Exploring AI integration for customer support automation. Early prototype showing 40% reduction in ticket resolution time. Board is interested in seeing results by Q2 for strategic planning session. No hard deadline, but competitive pressure building.
